title: Waking Maya
description: When Maya Burke unearths an old journal penned by her long-lost father, she discovers a roadmap for a spiritual journey, crafted exclusively for her. As she explores its teachings, she is catapulted onto a mind-bending cross-country adventure in pursuit of her father’s legacy. Immersed in realms of psychic revelations, mystical energy vortexes, and uncanny synchronicities, Maya is led to a spiritual underground that has revived an ancient meditation practice that could change the world. “Waking Maya” is a thrilling wisdom-packed quest to understand the deepest principles of our reality.
author: Warren Goldie
